ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 543
ygData.msgSnippet: Neverwinter Nights is a cool game.  In the single player I ve gotten to the final chapter,  but Haven t gotten all the way through it yet.  I haven t Played
ygData.messageBody:
Neverwinter Nights is a cool game.  In the single player I've gotten to the final chapter,  but Haven't gotten all the way through it yet.  I haven't Played Warcraft 3 yet,  but My Boyfriend just got it today & he's playing it as I type this..  Looks interesting...  Unfortunately I do not have enough room on my hard drive for it =(

Kat

  Su <suceress@...> wrote:

I've never played Warcraft but I do play Neverwinter Nights. Man, that's a
fun game. :-)
My mom, myself, my brother, and my sister all have seperate accounts. :-)
luv,
-Su

LOL....well we started 3 years ago. I play,my wife plays and our kids have
an account too. We have lots of fun at at. Of course now we are splitting
time with Neverwinter Nights and Warcraft 3. But always go back to EQ...:>


  ----- Original Message -----
  From: Toni
  To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Sunday, July 28, 2002 10:17 PM
  Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 543


  I have just one thing to say... YOU ROCK    I hope I'm still playing
everquest when I'm that age =D

  Toni
